definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
aggregate social demand/total requirement of society

pinyin: xu1 qiu2 ceng2 ci4 li3 lun4

sentences.english: When you have and hold a need, harken not to others greed.
sentences.chinese: 當你有需求的時候，不要聽從他人貪婪的想法。

sentences.english: A three Cigarette Lighter, very thoughtful, on-board electrical appliances you use needs.
sentences.chinese: 一分三點菸器，非常體貼你對車載電器使用的需求。

sentences.english: There are two ways to solve supply and demand contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 解決供需矛盾可從兩個方面着手，首先是減少需求。

sentences.english: Intents express abstract, high-level policy requirements.
sentences.chinese: 意圖表達抽象的高級策略需求。

sentences.english: Finally, to seek a corresponding point of the audiences from home and abroad under the globalizational context.
sentences.chinese: 在全球化語境下，尋求中外觀衆審美需求的契合點。

sentences.english: But in future chips, cores’ bandwidth requirements could fluctuate wildly.
sentences.chinese: 但在未來芯片中，核心的帶寬需求會劇烈波動。

sentences.english: Hence, future generations may have a stronger demand for wilderness areas than current generations .
sentences.chinese: 現在和未來的幾代人對荒野面積的需求會更強烈。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the needs of the families of hearing-impaired children.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解聽障兒童家長對康復認知與需求情況。

sentences.english: We should establish a customer demands value-driven distribution intellectual model.
sentences.chinese: 應建立以顧客的需求價值爲核心的營銷心智模式。

sentences.english: We are doing fine, meeting the customers' needs.
sentences.chinese: 挺好的，滿腳了客戶的需求。

sentences.english: He responded to the customers' needs by innovating.
sentences.chinese: 他以創新來應抵泯滅者的需求。

sentences.english: Each operating system makes its own unique demands on available memory resources.
sentences.chinese: 每個操作系統都有自己對可用內存資源的獨特需求。

sentences.english: User stories are typically written on 4x6 cards.
sentences.chinese: 用戶需求典型地是寫在4x6的卡片上。

sentences.english: There has been a stable demas well like in our market for this kind of toy.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的市場上，這種玩具的需求平素很穩定。

sentences.english: LOHAS is responsive to customer's needs.
sentences.chinese: 樂活是針對客戶的需求。

sentences.english: A perfect platform for educating new team members about what the solution entails.
sentences.chinese: 對新團隊成員進行有關解決方案需求教育的完美平臺。

definition: to furnish/to provide/supply (as in supply and demand)
to prefer/to be partial to sth/preference
